section.title: vendor types creating new Vendor Type
section.para: To create a new Vendor Type, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:
When creating a new Vendor Type, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter a code to uniquely identify the Vendor Type.
Enter a description to identify the Vendor Type.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without creating a new Vendor Type, returning you to the previous screen.
Creates the Vendor Type and adds it to the master list of Vendor Types.
